title: Ass Savers Win Wing MTB Fender
content:
Fender company Ass Savers just launched its redesigned Win Wing clip-on mud guard for mountain bikes (€33/34). Adaptable, reinforced, and with room for three fat inches of tire, it’ll keep your ass dry in sloppy conditions. The adjustable length of the wishbone enables it to suit a variety of frame types while keeping the optimal wheel zenith position regardless of 26″ full suspension or 29″ hardtail.

Check out more at Ass Savers.

 

The post Ass Savers Win Wing MTB Fender appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
